title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.11 - Assignments of counsel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.11 - Assignments of counsel

State Regulations

Assignments of counsel by the Family

Court, Supreme Court or Surrogate's Court to represent children in proceedings
wherein compensation is paid privately by one or more of the parties, or is
authorized pursuant to Judiciary Law, section 35 shall be made from the
attorneys for children panels designated pursuant to these rules. This section
shall not apply to institutional providers appointed pursuant to Family Court

Act, section 243(a). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
